curam.util.persistence.helper

Class CodetableState<V extends CodeTableEntry>

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.persistence.helper.State<V>
      • curam.util.persistence.helper.CodetableState<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the code table used to signify the state of the state machine

    public abstract class CodetableState<V extends CodeTableEntry>
extends State<V>
    Encapsulates the processing associated with state transitions for a state machine which stores its state as a codetable value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CodetableState

        protected CodetableState(java.util.Map<V,State<V>> states,
                         V state,
                         boolean modifyAllowed,
                         boolean removeAllowed)
        TODO: JavaDoc.
        Parameters:
        states - map to which to add this new state.
        state - the value held to signify that the state machine is in this state.
        modifyAllowed - whether "CRUD" modifications are permitted when the state machine is in this state.
        removeAllowed - whether physical database removal is permitted when state machine is in this state.
        See Also:
        State.State(Map, Object, boolean, boolean)
